Reviews.Title: Not as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Joseph H Flanigan
Reviews.Content: So I bought this phone about a week ago, and the phone I received was in excellent condition. No scratches, dents or dings. Also came with the box and all the accessories just as if I had bought from Apple. So that was awesome and the reason it got two stars instead of one. However, this phone was advertised as a factory unlocked iphone and it was not. It was still locked to AT&T.; It also came with a Gevey chip for unlocking the phone. (Which, had I put 2 and 2 together, I should have realized you would not need a Gevey chip if the phone was already factory unlocked.) And to top it off, the Gevey chip didn't work. So right now I have a call into AT&T;, hoping they will unlock it for me. (Finger crossed!) So if you plan on buying an iPhone 4S from this seller, realize you are getting a carried locked phone and the only two ways to unlock an iPhone 4S right now are either with the Gevey chip (if you get a working one) or if you can get AT&T; to unlock it for you.

Reviews.Title: The phone  is white, used and locked. Just the opposite of its descripion
Reviews.Author: Mona el toumi
Reviews.Content: I had this iphone 4s as a gift for my mother. She received it as a new black and unlocked. She has sent it for an apple store to insert her card. They told her that this phone had a box for a black one but it is while and it is used as it was blocked by a Bell Canada mobile company. Not to mention that my gift was a total fraud, my mother sent it for a communication company and she was informed that she has to pay an extra $150 to unlock it. Finally on November 26th at our thanksgiving party when she didn't have the iphone 4s. She told me the new the gift is not working. I was sad to have to go through all this. I paid $505 just to get useless phone. Now the buyer is playing games with me since NOv. 26 when I shared with the seller my concerns. I have sent the phone by USPS and the buyer refused to sign for it and rejected receiving it. Now I am trying still hoping that the buyer is busy or confused but she all the good intention. I used amazon many times. I trusted them so I still hope that I will have my money back. It is only the product is useless. I don't know how could I have prevented this of happening. The product is a stolen item or used one. How can you break the trust in online shopping. How can we trust this anymore???? I am heartbroken really

Reviews.Title: The phone that changes everything!!!
Reviews.Author: Johnny K
Reviews.Content: This new iPhone 4S is simply unbelievable. Siri is the most amazing thing that ever existed on a mobile device. It understands everything you ask it, everything! You can tell it to make you an appointment, find you an Italian restaurant or what a stock is trading at for the day. The 8 megapixel camera is unreal. The screen resolution is unmatched. The best part about THIS iPhone 4S though is that it is factory unlocked. You can put any US sim card in it, and when you travel, you can put any foreign sim card in it so there are never roaming charges. You will never have to sign a commitment with any carrier and the phone will never lock to one carrier! And, because it's factory unlocked, you can update your iPhone 4S software as soon as Apple releases a new version. IT WILL ALWAYS BE UNLOCKED!

Reviews.Title: This is the authentic Apple USA retail edition of the unlocked iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This is the authentic Apple USA retail edition of the unlocked iphone 4sMD234LL/A is for iphone 4s 16gb black, unlocked, USA retail package.MD237LL/A is for iphone 4s 16gb white, unlocked, USA retail package.All other models that claim unlocked iphone 4s, maybe Mexico, Canada or European Import.

Reviews.Title: Very Mad!
Reviews.Author: Dostoevsky "americanca_12"
Reviews.Content: So, after ordering 3 i-phones on Amazon, i am coming to the conclusion that it is neither safe nor worth it. All 3 phones, according to the Amazon' description, were UNLOCKED and BRAND NEW. However, ALL THREE came USED, LOCKED, AND BEING ACTIVATED TWICE! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND BUYING FROM THIS SELLER ANYTHING OR EVER! Moreover, i would NOT recommend buying an i-phones on Amazon, period(even though i was a #1 fan of this site). Big bummer!Hope it helps!

Reviews.Title: Scammed - Used, not New iPhone shipped
Reviews.Author: Tom & Jeanne
Reviews.Content: My order was clearly and unmistakably for an NEW iPhone 4S. The product description showed "List Price $649.00", which is the same price Apple sells new ones. The Wireless Extra price:"$482.50, You Save $166.50"and:*  Factory Unlocked by Apple, Never Opened*  New In Shrink-Wrap and Original Packaging*  Includes 1 Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty*  Ability to Add Apple Care Protection within 30 Days of PurchaseIt was clearly a used iPhone 4S in a scruffy box, not shrink-wrapped.I called Apple, provided the IMEI number. They said it had been sold in Nov. 2011 for use on AT&T.; Not eligible for Apple Care - no warranty at all!I called Wireless Extra and Will said I may have ordered the wrong item and if I was not satisfied to return it. If you order anything from Wireless Extra, check it out carefully. You may be getting a cheap used device, not a new device. They can make a lot of money selling to naïve customers who don't know they are being scammed.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Humberto
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a new phone, but I found out that it is a refurbished one. The battery was not holding the charge for more than a few minutes, thus I contacted Apple Customer Service and they told me this phone was returned several months ago due to the same issue. In theory, they fixed the problem and put the product back into the market.I do not trust this seller (Wireovia) and I do not recommend him.

Reviews.Title: cheaper on apple.com
Reviews.Author: Judit Nagy
Reviews.Content: You can buy the same unlocked iphone from the online apple store at apple.com, which is definitely genuine and is CHEAPER! Why anyone would want to pay more to buy this item from an unknown reseller is a mystery...

Reviews.Title: Apple store said this iphone had no serial number!
Reviews.Author: xandra
Reviews.Content: Last year I had a minor accident with this iPhone (it fell from not a very high distance, maybe from above the knee, it was a slight fall) and something very uncommon happened: its screen stopped working! Technicians at the Apple store considered it -again- uncommon, and therefore decided to replace the iphone for a new one. In order to replace it, however, they needed to look at its serial number. To their surprise (and to mine!), they came back to me saying this iphone had NO SERIAL NUMBER! Because of that, it couldn't be replaced and I had to buy a new one. I DEFINITELY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SELLER, AND HAVING BEEN A LOYAL AMAZON CLIENT, I no longer feel I can not trust the company as I blindly did so before this unfortunate incident.

Reviews.Title: RIP OFF!! Zero stars
Reviews.Author: Lawson
Reviews.Content: For those who are looking for an iPhone 4S, do not buy it from this seller or off amazon. They are refurbished phones and you will be wasting your money. The apple store has iPhone 4S factory unlocked way cheaper than this crook. At least you know apple isn't going to give you a broken phone when they tell you that it's a brand new phone. Always go to the apple store if you wanna buy an apple device.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished instad of new
Reviews.Author: Florencia Tejerina
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPhone a it was new on April this year, it was published as it was new. Last week I went to the apple store in NYC and I asked for a revision, they told me that this phone has been sold in April 2012 to Tony Phar so that was it is out of warranty since March 2013, just 2 weeks before I bought it AS IT WAS NEW, by Amazon to your provider. i paid usd 553 and it is supposed to be under warranty and it isn't, who is going to solve this? Who is going to pay me back for having a refurbished phone? Amazon or the provider should respond for this fraud, thanks

Reviews.Title: Buy it, love it. Trust me.
Reviews.Author: marcio mello
Reviews.Content: well, long ago i was a iPhone 3g user, then, because many friends insisted and the price was appealing, specially in Brazil,  i bought a galaxy S and was thrilled for abut 1 month, than i could t stop missing my old iPhone 3g(yes, thats right i would trade a galaxy S for an iPhone 3G in a second).iphone 4s =  awesome. i got more use of it on my first weekend with it than i did in 6 months of galaxy S. very fast. intuitive as always and IOS 5 is even better on a dual core. SIRI is unbelievable (and i mean it! My primary language is portuguese and she understand me perfectly, even when i force my accent).IOS x Android = never going back to android. IOS is far more intuitive and easy to operate. i couldn't get the wireless to work it self out whenever I were close to a hotspot on the android, for IOS its automatic. mail viewing and message thread is a lot easier on iOS  and the app store carries a much larger variety of items than the market does. iOS (at least so far, in my 3-4 years of experience with it) is safer, since i was recommended to get at least one antivirus for the galaxy s.though i think the battery lasts a little less than it should,  i can still get about 2 days of use, unless i talk to SIRI a lot, then it would last for one day no problem.the screen could be a little bigger, but i haven't resent going from a 4"to a 3.5"...cons: lens break very easily, so a case or bumper is a need. the antenna seems to have some issues still, but nothing that a good old bumper wouldn't solve.well. this is my review. i strongly recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Near perfect...
Reviews.Author: Nse Ette
Reviews.Content: This is the best iPhone yet. The design (same as with iPhone 4) is sleek and eye catching (everyone will want to touch it), and screen resolution is fantastic, with images clear and crisp. Sound quality is great; volume and ring tone are very loud. A quick swipe from the top to the bottom of the screen gives you a summary (of weather, news, reminders, etc) at a glance. As the phone is unlocked, you can swap sim cards with ease and use in any country, well almost (more on that at the end of my review).Siri (the robot assistant) is rather good and intuitive, and can do anything from searching through your phone (or the web), to telling you what the weather will be wherever you are (using the location application). I like how she/he learns your name and uses it in communication. You can even use Siri to set location-based reminders, e.g. "Remind me to call Dad when I get home" or "Remind me to stop at the store when I leave here". Of course the location application should be on. Text (in SMSs, emails, notes, webpages, etc) can also be read out to you, and you can also dictate these. Pity you don't get voice commands with the Maps.The 8MP camera takes decent photos; you can take photos with flash, or HDR (which takes two shots with different exposures for you to select from or keep), and you can switch to the front-facing camera which also serves as a video cam. It utilizes face recognition technology, or you can tap on the image you want to focus on the screen. You can edit images in your photo albums (rotate, crop, remove red-eye, etc).The iPod gets a light tweaking; video and audio are separated (just like with the iPod Touch), and I like that the audio player shows album details like year of release and duration of album. There is iMessenger, like BlackBerry messenger for iPhones, as well as Facetime which allows you to make video calls.My two gripes are poor battery life (barely half a day if you browse a bit), and the fact that it requires a micro SIM, meaning you have to snip away at your regular sized SIM if you must use it. Other than that, a fantastic experience.

Reviews.Title: THIS APPLE IPHONE IS LOCKED
Reviews.Author: Edward D Chraska
Reviews.Content: This apple iphone 4s 16GB Black is a locked phone it sells as a factory unlocked what can I do with it now.

Reviews.Title: Never Again Will I Buy a Cell Phone off Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Cowgirl
Reviews.Content: I bought an Iphone from an Amazon seller. It arrived fast and looked like it was in great condition. By the time I got a sim card and a service plan several weeks had passed. The phone wouldn't pick up any service! I addressed the seller with the issue who insisted that the item was in working condition. They gave me a few options to try and acted like I couldn't return it. I decided too just keep trying to figure out what was wrong with the phone rather that dispute the purchase then since I really wanted it. After several months of research I finally found out that the reason the phone won't get service is because it was reported stolen! I feel so betrayed as a buyer! I can only hope Amazon will help me get my money back.

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Rhoney
Reviews.Content: Order off of apple's website. It is the same price and it will be unlocked. This is a hassle to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Rip off price
Reviews.Author: David M. Williams "El Blanco"
Reviews.Content: Selling this phone for $55 more than Apple does on their site is tantamount to piracy. These retailers should be ashamed of themselves for trying to cheat their customers.

Reviews.Title: It's not new!
Reviews.Author: Armando
Reviews.Content: This phone is not new! Two days after I bought it I got a mail saying that I'd get a 32GB one instead because of a special Christmas offer. However the phone I got was in no shape new. It was, in fact, a 32GB one, but the phone was rebuilt and a poorly job at that. It has loose parts and the has troubles with sounds within phone calls. NOT WHAT I PAID FOR!!

Reviews.Title: The worst service I've had so far
Reviews.Author: Vyacheslav Bratslavski "ross_kramerov"
Reviews.Content: In spite of the fact I had paid for expeditionary post service on Wed 01/29/2014 (it was promised the item would be delivered not later than Friday 01/31/2014) the new  I-phone 4S came on Monday 02/03/2014 which is 3 days later.  The package was half open, I didn't activate the phone yet. I lost $30 for the prepaid card (I had to wait 3 more days) and $12 for expeditionary service. No apologies,nothing. Also, I didn't get the receipt that I own the phone!!!! it is outrageous!!! They promised that I could take Care plan within 30 days after the purchase but didn't bother to explain how to do that. I'm really thinking to quit Amazon for dealing with the companies like this.P/S I will update the information regarding the device itself as I didn't activate it yet. Hopefully it will be alright , otherwise I will sue the Amazon or the Tablet Distributes or both. And I must tell - I've been a customer of Amazon for years and was very satisfied until today

Reviews.Title: This product didn't have warranty
Reviews.Author: Victor Hamel
Reviews.Content: The advertising stated that this product is new and it comes with one year warranty and is eligible for Apple care within 30 days.  I was told by the Apple store that the warranty on this product had expired in May 12, 2012 and I couldn't purchase Apple care since it wasn't new.

Reviews.Title: returned item
Reviews.Author: Consumer 5
Reviews.Content: There was something highly suspicious about the seller writing to tell me 'he upgraded my purchase to a better version so make sure I give him a good review' which prompted me to go back and read the reviews.  Read too many negative reports regarding bum iphones sold over Amazon and after being burned once in another area regarding an unrelated item, I returned it thus avoiding a  costly headache down the line when nothing can be done to retrieve my money.  I next discovered that the exact same item could be purchased directly from the manufacturer for $25 less!!!  We purchased the unlocked iphone directly from Apple in a completely sealed box.  The box we received from the seller was not sealed the same way and the phone had smudged fingerprints on the filmy clear covering that protected it as if someone had fiddled with it, even though the box was sealed.  With too many flags raised for my comfort level it was a huge relief to just send it back.

Reviews.Title: REALLY BAD!
Reviews.Author: JULY RODRIGUES
Reviews.Content: I bought this Phone for a Present, The Little boy lives in Venezuela, when he opened the battery and the charger were having some problems. He went to an Apple Store in Venezuela and they said to him that the Iphone was Used and the charger was not the Original. The father had to paid $200 to replace it for a New One. Don't buy anything from them, they sell this Phone as a New one, but it isnt.

Reviews.Title: Not as promise
Reviews.Author: Nebiyou Haddis
Reviews.Content: The item have a broken glass at one corner and it came with completely worn out plastic cloth cover/case it is below my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Ordered a new Factory unlocked  iphone 4s but it was NOT as ADVERTISED!
Reviews.Author: Smith
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a new factory unlocked iphone 4s from this provider. They promised that it was brand new and unused however, when I tried to get an extended warranty through Apple they told me that the phone was actually registered to ANOTHER woman already. I told them the serial number on the phone and the one on the apple packaging that it came in and low and behold they did not match! The phone did arrive in apple packaging but it was not sealed and the protectors on the screen were damaged. I immediatly was suspicous of this because when Apple products arrive to the customer their packaging is immaculate and FULLY sealed with plastic. Therefore, I would NOT RECOMMEND purchasing from his company because they do not provide what they advertise and I would not have known if I had not tried to get an extended warranty from Apple. So BEWARE because you might think you are getting a deal when you purchase a brand new Iphone from this company but only to find out that it is actually a used or refurbished product!!!! I only had the phone for 2 hours before sending it right back to Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Bad description
Reviews.Author: Ivaylo H Zlatinov
Reviews.Content: Phone was in good condition but not factory unlocked, as stated in CAPS!Cost me $50 or so to unlock and daughter was disappointed.

Reviews.Title: horrible

Reviews.Content: "phone described as "mint condition. no marks, scratches or scuffs" arrived with speaker not working and significant scratch on screen. paid for expedited delivery as gift for son going overseas. no time to return so had to pay to fix speaker. will have to live with scratch. very disappointed. will not use this seller again."

Reviews.Content: I bought the Iphone 4S factory unlocked and I received an Iphone 4 locked.I want to know what is going on...I don't want my money back, I just want the product as I first ordered, and I did not receive that.Thanks for your cooperation.Felipe

Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, we are using this phone with local operator in Venezuela and working fine.  Seller support also good since we have problems connecting it.  Recommend it fully.

Reviews.Title: It came opened and clearly manipulated!
Reviews.Author: Bar W
Reviews.Content: The iphone box was not plastic wrapped and it had a hand-written "A" on it. The phone itself was full of fingerprints and came with an empty battery (it's supposed to come charged). The outside brown shipping box it came in was totally opened on both ends, so we don't really know if it was an issue of the seller or the shipping agent... We know it wasn't a problem of someone opening the box after it was delivered at home because I was at home when the shipping truck arrived and opened the door just as they were leaving. We called Amazon and they solved the issue, they sent us a shipping label to return it for free and we got our money back.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Gerardo
Reviews.Content: I had my fears towards buying cellphones over the internet, but this one came just as announce. Its an amazing product.

Reviews.Title: The IPhone I bought looks like it was stolen or used
Reviews.Author: Erluick Gorrochotegui "Leogosa"
Reviews.Content: The IPhone I bought looks like it was stolen or used for the following reasons:The serial that appears on the box is different as the serial of the IPhone.When I tryed to activate the phone line the telephone company realized that the IMEI number that appeared in the box was reported as stolen, but the IMEI of the IPhone was different and was not reported as stolen.The protective coat of the IPhone was damaged and the box didn't come with the security cellophane cover (the box was open).The charger didn't work, I had to buy a new charger but the battery takes too long to be completely charged.I pay for expedite shipping and the deliver of the IPhone tooks more than two weeks.I could accept the failure of the charger and the deffects on the proctective coat of the phone if the phone were used, but the description says that it was "brand new", but anyway the fact that it was used does not justify the fact that the serial of the box does not mach the phone serial and that the IMEI of the box was reported as stolen.

Reviews.Title: Used iPhone and out of guaranty
Reviews.Author: Josue R.
Reviews.Content: The iPhone is in good condition but is not new like they say. Is out of guaranty I hope don't have any problems in the future.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT buy from this seller!!!!!!!!!!!!

Iphone was covered by preservative film in the box instead of original plastic protector !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! and mic doesn't work!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! what the heck!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am just so mad right now!

Reviews.Title: USED electronic products
Reviews.Author: Belgin
Reviews.Content: I really don't understand why people lie to each other. This product was promoted as "Used-Like new" but it appears that the glass panel, battery and one important part have been replaced, which makes it refurbished, not "Like new". It must have been dropped and badly damaged, they've told me from Service Department. Shortly, it doesn't work on 2G, because the 2G connections, some of which are at hard to reach place, are broken. Well, guys, I definitely do NOT recommend buying used products from Electronics. Users do not sell products, they are happy with, so go to NEW products. This is my 2nd used electronic product I bought through Amazon and I am deeply disappointed...

I had to send it for repair here in Venezuela. It is assumed that I am buying a new iPhone, not worn or defective equipment. It is the first time something like this happens to me buying a product from Amazon. I'm disappointed.

Reviews.Content: Actually the camera wasn't working. I had to open it to see which was the problem and it turned out to have a plastic between the camera and lens. The camera still was looking bloomy and I noticed that the lens had little scratches.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this to use in Indonesia!

Reviews.Content: I will be living in Indonesia for the next few years and have to use the carriers available here.  I missed my American iphone 4S so bought this one that is sold as "unlocked" to use with a Telkomsel sim card.  Well after WEEKS of trying, I finally found someone who could unlock it to make it work here!  I really don't know how this can be sold as factory unlocked when it clearly is not.  I'm giving this 2 stars because it really is a 4S and now that it works at all, it's what I wanted.  But this product should be listed as not suitable for international use. I expect better from Amazon Prime!

Point: It hasn't any sound neighter, only vibrate but no sound at all.And 3th and most important: Is locked! so I can't use it with any chip here in Paraguay! I have to change the phone immediately!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S Beware
Reviews.Author: Lori L. Bond "llbb"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unlocked phone from Miamoresales. When I tried to get service with my carrier, discovered the phone was blocked (stolen?) and I cannot establish service.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed

Reviews.Content: I ordered this item for two times. First time, it came as a used one, because the original packaging has been opened. So I got it returned. And I think maybe that's a mistake when they process my order.Second, it's also came as a used one. The original packaging has been opened. Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: After receiving this phone as a replacement phone, I promptly hooked it up to sync it with my computer.  Of course my computer then told me it had a software update so I went ahead and did that, and my phone turned into a brick.  After numerous attempts at diagnosing the error I called apple.  I read them the serial-IMEI number.  They then informed me that this phone was actually not unlocked.  Upon looking at my order receipt it clearly states that when you update to IOS 6 the phone is not unlocked if updated via apple server and it will turn into a "brick".  Right there on the receipt after the "factory unlocked, sealed box" stuff.  Apple said that was another indicator that it wasn't factory unlocked.  Needless to say I contacted Buy Mart, they wanted to replace my phone and I said no way.  They are supposed to be giving me a refund, I wonder how many fees will be attached.  I would have given one star, but once customer service was contacted they did pretty good.

Reviews.Title: cell

Reviews.Content: excellent product. I am very satisfied with my purchase of truth .. are very responsible people ;)buy my people!!

Reviews.Title: Hi
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, I get asked time and is unlocked, but did not bring me to open the part where the SIM card goes.

Reviews.Title: Like a new, working 100%

Reviews.Content: Almost no scratches, like a new, working with T-Moble, and i did the upgrade to 6.0.1 and still working! Was a good deal! Thanks

Reviews.Title: Serves my Purpose
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 4S met my expectation as described on Amazon. It also works well with all my other Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Better than iPhone 5..
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: Factory unlocked (I travel overseas quite often), beautiful design, and feels more solid in the hand than the newer iPhone 5.  I purchased the latest edition of the iPhone on launch day but after several weeks with the device I sold it and came back to the iPhone 4S.I got a used one (in great condition) for more than $100 less than it sells at Apple.  Great deal on one of the world's most beautiful and functional devices.

Reviews.Title: THis phone

Reviews.Content: Is awesome! THough I am not speaking on behalf of this sales person, I know that this phone is amazing. There is nothing bad about this phone and I love the longer screen. It's faster than the previous model and it is SIGNIFICANTLY lighter. I high recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S 16GB Black - FACTORY UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the product and liked the timeliness and reliability of the company that bought the product.I recommend the product and the company that bought the product.

Reviews.Title: The Gold Standard
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: An unlocked GSM iPhone 4S is the gold standard if you're traveling; nothing compares. Build quality, usability, apps - everything just works like it's suppose to. You can spend less on a larger screen or more bells and whistles but Apple has it figured out to a science. A lot of hotels have iPhone docks so even charging it works great when on the road. Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Susana
Reviews.Content: So i ordered the iphone on january 4th and by the 6th it had been shipped. After a few days, the tracking history by UPS was still the same, it said that a label had been created and that the package was ready for UPS, but yet no other info. I waited for another few days and it remained the same. I was a little stressed out because i am from another country and i was sending to a friend that was vacationing in the US, so time was a big deal. I emailed the seller on several occasions asking where my stuff was but got what i suppose was an automatic response that said that the item had been shipped and to verify my send to address. Still no info on the iphone. So later i decided to call them and they figured out that the package was sent but apparentaly it got lost sometime between the pick up and the registry at the UPS facility, so they asked me if i wanted a refund or if i wanted it sent again, i chose to have it sent again. That same day i had a new tracking number and they sent it with UPS within two business days, i called on the 16th and UPS had their first delivery attempt on friday the 18th, although no one answered but still got it on monday just in time so my friend could bring it on tuesday.The iphone came in perfect conditions and it was the model MD234LL/4 which is the black unlocked version for retail in the US. I was a little concerned it wouldn't work because of some reviews i red but the day i got it, i went to the cellphone company and it has been working perfectly. And why not buy it directly from the apple store and save around $50? Well, they don't take credit cards from certain countries, including Venezuela.Overall, I highly reccomend this seller, well they were very attentive and did their best. The product was the unlocked version just as i ordered it.

This is important because AT&T; probably won't unlock a phone still locked on their network without paying off old account balances or an ETF (early termination fee).  The phone has a very small hairline crack on the back, but 2 months later, it still hasn't expanded larger.  The crack is small enough that I wouldn't have noticed it if I wasn't looking for something.  I can't even feel it with my finger.  Note that you'll need a nano sim card and that MMS might not work on AT&T; MVNO.  This is a fault of Apple's and doesn't affect T-Mobile MVNOs or the original Network apparently.

Reviews.Title: Another Wi-Fi Disaster from Apple
Reviews.Author: Music Is Everything "Music Is Everything"
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 4S is a great idea poorly executed.  Like the iPhone 4, which sparked a class-action lawsuit over its poor wi-fi antenna, the iPhone 4S is dogged by thousands of blog postings and reviews all over the internet that expose a serious problem with its wi-fi abilities.  The 4S is really a small computer, with Apple's endless offering of apps and very good voice control via Siri, but all of that causes massive data usage.  Unless you have an unlimited plan, you really need to use wi-fi as much as possible to avoid overages.  Perhaps even more important, the phone is much slower in 3G or 4G than on wi-fi, and you can't update the operating system unless the phone can access wi-fi for the massive download (unless you hook the 4S up to a computer, but then the update often fails multiple times before completing, causing hours of lost time).Despite Apple's reputation for innovative products, they also have a well-deserved reputation for ignoring these types of problems.  Despite all the blog entries in their own forums, Apple hasn't acknowledged this problem or offered any solutions (other than buying yet another phone, of course).Having used the 4S for over a year, I can say that it WAS a big step forward from my previous phone, but if I had known about the wi-fi issues, I would have bought something else.  As it stands now, I'm very unlikely to purchase another iPhone because of these persistent problems and Apple's complete lack of customer support.

Reviews.Title: This is an entertainment devise. Not a smart phone.
Reviews.Author: J. Griffiths
Reviews.Content: I've owned smart phones before they were called smart phones. If this phone and others like it were called entertainment phones I would rate it much higher. As a practical business phone it's very lacking in it's control, management, and ability to classify it's data. I have yet to find an app that will easily put contacts in groups with their associated business or profession. In example, lets say you were referred to a doctor by your GP a number of years back, one of many and you can't remember his name. With the older smart phones you would just pull down the classified group list and select medical and you would have a list doctors with what you specified as their specialty. The current smart phones don't have that kind of ability to create classifications. So you have to scroll through your entire contact list and select each person with a Dr in front of his name (oh and you better remember the doctors first name to because that's how it list everyone and every thing--from the "First Name" line!), then select one, read the note regarding their field of work (over and over until you find the doctor your looking for). I have looked at many apps to try and find one as good as the stock contact list that my old palm treo had and so far there's only one. But it's way over complex for what should be a simple task. Apple's "Note" on the IPhone has the same problems. Once again I did find an app that would do, but it's ability to create and classify the notes requires a lot more effort then the palm stock program called Memo. I would go back to using my old Palm Treo but it's been dropped one to many times and now it resets it's self 3 or 4 times a day and I loose the reminders that I have yet to deal with. I choose the IPhone 4S over the Android phone because of their reputation for only allowing apps to be sold after their tested and approval by Apple. After looking for the above mentioned apps I noticed quit a few apps with bug fixes and low customer ratings. So much for that reputation. Another reason I choose apple is because of the customer raves about SIRI. I thought that would work better for voice dialing. Not so. SIRI has some strange problems. It will recognize and repeat what I say and then say it cant find it in my contacts list. Then it instead goes off looking for it online and comes back with other businesses with the same name but it won't be the business I'm looking for. And even though SIRI knows where I'm located by stating that the business is 49 mile from my current location. I may be only 2 miles from the business I'm trying to call. I contacted Apple about this and was told their aware of this problem. So, so much for that plus. I'd return the phone and get a blackberry but with their stock plunging do to their lack of going with the flow of current smart phones I would just end up in the same boat. The problem here is that the smart phone business that once was primarily for business users has now become one of the latest rage of the average public user who the mfg.s think only cares about using the phones for games, video entertainment, and texting. So even though it would be easy to incorporate the features I am missing from my palm the mfg.s just go with the flow and so does the market.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product

Reviews.Content: I purchased this product awhile back, and I just have to say, this is a HORRIBLE product. The durability of this product is a durable as a wet paper plate. Until you make your products more bullet proof, I will not be buying anymore Apple products. Even my tv worked after one bullet wound. Pick up the pace Apple.
